bioconda.name: bioconductor-dama
bioconda.summary: Efficient design and analysis of factorial two-colour microarray data

biotools.summary: This package contains functions for the efficient design of factorial two-colour microarray experiments and for the statistical analysis of factorial microarray data.

bioschemas.name: daMA
bioschemas.summary: This package contains functions for the efficient design of factorial two-colour microarray experiments and for the statistical analysis of factorial microarray data.
